name: UDrawFrustumComponent
doc: Utility component for drawing a view frustum. Origin is at the component location, frustum points down position X axis.

bFrustumEnabled: Enable or disable frustum visualization for this camera
FrustumColor: Color to draw the wireframe frustum.
FrustumAngle:
Angle of longest dimension of view shape.
If the angle is 0 then an orthographic projection is used
FrustumAspectRatio: Ratio of horizontal size over vertical size.
FrustumStartDist: Distance from origin to start drawing the frustum.
FrustumEndDist: Distance from origin to stop drawing the frustum.
Texture: optional texture to show on the near plane
